metadata.name: Soul | روح   - Second Act.
metadata.description:
There are a million stories waiting to be told...

Stories that reveal themselves after entering a process of dissociation of self, releasing that silver thread that binds our spirit and body letting us be completely free...

These stories have left a trace of their existence in something as subtle as a scar, a wrinkle, or even a light shimmer in the eyes...

They whisper to us hoping that we listen to them...

Hoping that we pause for a second, and read the pages of that book by entering through the eyes and taking a deep dive into the ocean of their existence called Soul.

-

By: Ilan Derech
Location: Marrakesh, Morocco
Shot on: Sony A7Rii & ZEISS Loxia 2/50
Year: 2019
